title: You have exceeded the maximum number of transactions allowed. Please try again later.
body:
Recently i have bought some RP using pay pal but then i went to purchase some more and i got this message (look at title) any ideas on how to fix this its been 60+ hours since it started.

p.s riot support haven't got back to me yet and its been a LONG time

{{champion:86}} Thank you

replies.body: got any update on your problem? im having the same issue and the support has yet to responde.

It sounds like you've been waiting for quite a bit, and we'd like to help out if you're still having this!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our billing team can help find out what's going wrong.  We'll reply asap!
